name: Monster Pub
description:
Monster Pub is a casual narrative game about finding friends in a new town.

Play as monster-you and meet the barflies at the local public house!
Bond through the power of conversation! Play card games! Be a good friend, or kind of a crummy friend!FEATURES:
  • All 3 Chapters! Experience the whole game from the luxury of your own Steam Library!
  • Monsters!
  • Remember "Egyptian Rat Screw" from summer camp? It's in here!
  • Remember "Solitaire" from "Solitaire"? It's not in here, but a kind of solitaire is!
  • Realistic simulations of human (?!) interaction!
  • Secrets?! Perhaps!
